topics.body:
I like looking at images that portray a single dead main character for an animated series.
And everyone is sad in the image. There's also blood and sometimes, even the ghost of the dead character.

I think my hobby of looking at these images are related to my guilt over my uncle's death.
... I think I became a bit sadistic.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body: How come during its 153 episode run, the original Dragon Ball anime never changed the opening and ending themes? Sure, they changed the animation, but never the songs themselves. And DBZ only had to change its theme song once.
topics.author: 554d477e63687270dee30600

"@Virgil Stormblade":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559a96b16368726fb3002387#post_559a96b16368726fb3002387
I guess cause people really loved them.

Anyway, The One-punch man thing I was going to say earlier.

Saitama technically does have a weakness.

He doesn't know any real fighting techniques, So all he can really do is basic punches and kicks and stuff.

It doesn't really matter though, Since he's so absurdly powerful that he doesn't even need stuff like that.

topics.body:
its fun having nightmares, especially the ones that rely on reflections of current pressing issues and figures and putting them in a position of prominence and power so they can hold you by the neck and have their talons drain you of any decipherable sliver of hope

i mean i guess they are supposed to terrify me but goddamn
